minions.name: Zombie Lord
minions.description: You may play an extra minion of power 2 or less from your discard pile on each base where you have no minions

minions.name: Grave Digger
minions.description: You may place a minion from your discard pile into your hand

minions.name: Tenacious Z
minions.description: Special: During your turn you may play this card from your discard pile as an extra minion. You may only use the ability of one Tenacious Z each turn

minions.name: Walker
minions.description: Look at the top card of your deck. Discard it or return it to the top of your deck

actions.name: Grave Robbing
actions.description: Place a card from your discard pile into your hand

actions.name: They Keep Coming
actions.description: Play an extra minion from your discard pile

actions.name: Lend a Hand
actions.description: Shuffle any number of cards from your discard pile into your deck

actions.name: Mall Crawl
actions.description: Search your deck for any number of cards with the same name and place them into your discard pile. Shuffle your deck

actions.name: Not Enough Bullets
actions.description: Place any number of minions with the same name from your discard pile into your hand

actions.name: Outbreak
actions.description: Play an extra minion on a base where you have no minions

actions.name: Overrun
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players cannot play minions on this base. Destroy this action at the start of your turn

actions.name: They're Coming To Get You
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: On your turn, you may play a minion here from your discard pile instead of from your hand
